content.question: Non-verbal is also one of the Broad Categories of Communication? Explain.
solution: Paralanguage refers to the way a message is delivered rather than the words themselves. It includes voice quality, intonation, pitch, stress, emotion, and speaking style. These elements help convey approval, interest, or disinterest. Research suggests that tone accounts for 38% of communication.

Cultural barriers arise when individuals from different cultural backgrounds struggle to understand each other. Differences in language, symbols, traditions, and communication styles can create misunderstandings. Multinational companies often provide cultural training to employees to bridge these gaps.
